description: Static site generator for Node.js, Grunt.js, and Yeoman (and soon, Gulp), using the Handlebars template engine. Used by Zurb Foundation, Zurb Ink, H5BP/Effeckt, Less.js / lesscss.org, Topcoat, Web Experience Toolkit, and hundreds of other projects to build sites, themes, components, documentation, blogs and gh-pages. Pull requests welcome, stars appreciated!
